name: Book Template with Fuzzy Friends Illustrations
description:
This template will bring some serious design power to your books! Even if you've never designed anything in your life, you'll find our new children's book template surprisingly easy-to-edit while using our Figma plugin! 


This template features Fuzzy Friends illustrations ðŸ’™


Edit the illustrations!

All the illustrations in this project were made with Blush, which means that you can customize them however you want using the Blush plugin!


Get the plugin

To get the best out of this collection, install the Blush plugin and edit all the doodles.
